content: Does anyone understand why the error I reference in this comment comes up for the snoc-y version of this lemma, but not the cons-y version?
I think it's similar to how only one of n + 0 = n and 0 + n = 0 is true by definition
Yeah, this is what I tried explaining. docs#Fin.succAbove_zero is rfl while docs#Fin.succAbove_last is not.
